metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1304 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read/write vulnerability was found in e2fsprogs 1.46.5. This issue leads to a segmentation fault and possibly arbitrary code execution via a specially crafted filesystem.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-1304` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

e2fsck-static - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
e2fsprogs - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
e2fsprogs-l10n - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
fuse2fs - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
libcom-err2 - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
libext2fs2 - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
libss2 - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
logsave - 1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: e2fsprogs package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.46.3-1ubuntu3.1').
